messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
How cold does it get this Friday?
To provide the weather forecast for this Friday, could you please specify your location (city or coordinates)? This will help me find the most accurate information for you.

No problem! If you’re unsure of your location, you can tell me the name of a nearby city, landmark, or region. Alternatively, if you happen to know your latitude and longitude (which some smartphones or maps can show), you can provide those as well.

Could you share any details about your general area? Even the country or state will help narrow it down for your weather forecast.
I don't have any of that info right now.

That’s okay! Without a general location, I can’t provide a specific weather forecast, as weather varies greatly depending on the region.

If you find out your location later (even just your city or a nearby landmark), let me know and I’ll be happy to get the forecast for this Friday for you. If you have any other questions in the meantime, feel free to ask!
